nodes.id: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司

zh-cn: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京朝阳区酒仙桥路6号院（电子城国际电子总部）2号楼
location.en: Building 2, No. 6 Jiuxianqiao Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆的一家主营安全相关的互联网公司，由周鸿祎和齐向东于2005年9月成立。旗下产品有360安全卫士、360杀毒、360搜索等。该公司曾与多家中国互联网公司发生商业纠纷和诉讼。
description.en: A mainland Chinese internet company focusing on security-related products, founded by Zhou Hongyi and Qi Xiangdong in September 2005. Its products include 360 Safeguard, 360 Total Security, 360 Search, and more. The company has been involved in business disputes and lawsuits with several other Chinese internet companies.

description.zh-cn: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司联合创始人兼董事长。毕业于西安交通大学，曾就职于方正集团，并于2004年任雅虎中国总裁。
description.en: Co-founder and Chairman of Qihoo 360. A graduate of Xi'an Jiaotong University, he previously worked at Founder Group and served as the President of Yahoo! China in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司的联合创始人，曾任公司总裁。毕业于长春邮电学院。
description.en: Co-founder of Qihoo 360, formerly served as the company's President. Graduated from Changchun University of Posts and Telecommunications.

description.zh-cn: 微软公司在中国的分支机构。曾与奇虎360合作，为中国Windows用户提供安全及升级服务。
description.en: The Chinese branch of Microsoft Corporation. It partnered with Qihoo 360 to provide security and upgrade services for Windows users in China.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府的行政部门，于2020年5月将奇虎360列入《出口管制条例》实体清单。
description.en: An executive department of the U.S. government, which added Qihoo 360 to the Entity List of the Export Administration Regulations in May 2020.

description.zh-cn: 一套由美国商务部管理的法规，用于控制特定商品和技术的出口。奇虎360于2020年被列入该条例的实体清单。
description.en: A set of regulations administered by the U.S. Department of Commerce to control the export of certain goods and technologies. Qihoo 360 was added to its Entity List in 2020.

nodes.id: 江南嘉捷电梯股份有限公司

zh-cn: 江南嘉捷电梯股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 奇虎360于2017年通过与该公司进行资产重组，成功实现A股借壳上市，后更名为“三六零”。
description.en: In 2017, Qihoo 360 completed a backdoor listing on the A-share market through an asset restructuring with this company, which was later renamed '360 Security Technology Inc.'.

description.zh-cn: 奇虎360于2011年3月在此上市，并于2016年7月完成私有化后摘牌。
description.en: Qihoo 360 was listed here in March 2011 and delisted in July 2016 after completing its privatization.

description.zh-cn: 2014年1月，奇虎360公司授权的台湾代理商。
description.en: In January 2014, became the authorized agent for Qihoo 360 in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中国互联网公司，与奇虎360在不正当竞争、商标侵权、违反Robots协议等领域发生过多次法律诉讼。
description.en: A Chinese internet company that has been involved in multiple legal disputes with Qihoo 360 regarding unfair competition, trademark infringement, and violation of the Robots Exclusion Standard.

zh-cn: 金山安全软件有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国软件公司，与奇虎360及其董事长周鸿祎在商业诋毁和不正当竞争方面有过多次激烈的法律纠纷。
description.en: A Chinese software company that has had numerous intense legal conflicts with Qihoo 360 and its chairman Zhou Hongyi over commercial defamation and unfair competition.

description.zh-cn: 中国互联网巨头，因“360隐私保护器”和“扣扣保镖”与奇虎360爆发了著名的“3Q大战”，双方就商业诋毁、不正当竞争和滥用市场支配地位等问题多次对簿公堂。
description.en: A Chinese internet giant that engaged in the famous '3Q War' with Qihoo 360 over the '360 Privacy Protector' and 'KouKou Bodyguard' software. The two companies sued each other multiple times on issues of commercial defamation, unfair competition, and abuse of dominant market position.

zh-cn: 艺进娱辉科技投资公司

description.zh-cn: 中国信息安全公司，曾与奇虎360因不正当竞争问题发生法律诉讼。
description.en: A Chinese information security company that was involved in a lawsuit with Qihoo 360 over unfair competition.

description.zh-cn: 因奇虎360官网发表的文章对其构成侵权而起诉该公司，并获胜诉。
description.en: Sued Qihoo 360 for infringement due to articles published on its official website and won the case.

description.zh-cn: 金山网络CEO。因其在社交媒体上对奇虎360的抨击言论，被奇虎360以商业信誉诋毁为由起诉。
description.en: CEO of Kingsoft Network. He was sued by Qihoo 360 for commercial defamation over his critical remarks about the company on social media.

description.zh-cn: 中国互联网公司，与奇虎360因不正当竞争及商业诋毁等问题相互提起诉讼。
description.en: A Chinese internet company that has engaged in mutual lawsuits with Qihoo 360 concerning unfair competition and commercial defamation.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国西安的著名高等学府，是周鸿祎的母校。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning in Xi'an, China, and the alma mater of Zhou Hongyi.

description.zh-cn: 周鸿祎在创立奇虎360之前曾就职的公司。
description.en: The company where Zhou Hongyi worked before founding Qihoo 360.

description.zh-cn: 雅虎公司在中国的业务分支，周鸿祎曾于2004年担任其总裁。
description.en: The Chinese business arm of Yahoo!, where Zhou Hongyi served as president in 2004.

en: Changchun University of Posts and Telecommunications

description.zh-cn: 奇虎360联合创始人齐向东的母校。
description.en: The alma mater of Qihoo 360 co-founder Qi Xiangdong.

description.zh-cn: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司高管，曾任董事长助理。
description.en: An executive at Qihoo 360, previously served as Assistant to the Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司高管，曾任副总裁。
description.en: An executive at Qihoo 360, previously served as Vice President.

description.en: Zhou Hongyi co-founded Qihoo 360 with Qi Xiangdong in September 2005.

relationships.target: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 齐向东与周鸿祎于2005年9月共同创立了三六零安全科技股份有限公司（原奇虎360）。
description.en: Qi Xiangdong co-founded Qihoo 360 with Zhou Hongyi in September 2005.

relationships.target: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 周鸿祎是三六零安全科技股份有限公司的董事长和实际控制人。
description.en: Zhou Hongyi is the Chairman and actual controller of Qihoo 360.

relationships.target: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 齐向东曾担任三六零安全科技股份有限公司的总裁。
description.en: Qi Xiangdong formerly served as the President of Qihoo 360.

方正集团

description.zh-cn: 周鸿祎在创立奇虎360之前曾就职于方正集团。
description.en: Zhou Hongyi worked at Founder Group before founding Qihoo 360.

relationships.target: 雅虎中国

relationships.source: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司
relationships.target: 微软中国

description.zh-cn: 双方于2014年和2015年两次达成合作，为中国的Windows XP、Windows 7及以上版本用户提供安全防护和系统升级服务。
description.en: The two parties partnered twice in 2014 and 2015 to provide security protection and system upgrade services for users of Windows XP, Windows 7, and later versions in China.

relationships.source: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司
relationships.target: 纽约证券交易所

description.zh-cn: 奇虎360于2011年3月30日在纽约证券交易所上市，后于2016年7月18日完成私有化并摘牌。
description.en: Qihoo 360 was listed on the New York Stock Exchange on March 30, 2011, and was subsequently delisted on July 18, 2016, after completing its privatization.

relationships.source: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司
relationships.target: 江南嘉捷电梯股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2017年11月，奇虎360通过与江南嘉捷进行资产重组，实现A股借壳上市，并于2018年2月28日正式更名为“三六零”。
description.en: In November 2017, Qihoo 360 achieved a backdoor listing on the A-share market through an asset restructuring with Jiangnan Jiajie, and was officially renamed '360 Security Technology Inc.' on February 28, 2018.

relationships.target: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 美国商务部将奇虎360列入《出口管制条例》下的实体清单，对其进行制裁。
description.en: The U.S. Department of Commerce placed Qihoo 360 on the Entity List under the Export Administration Regulations, imposing sanctions on the company.

relationships.source: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司
relationships.target: 希悦资讯

description.zh-cn: 2014年1月，奇虎360授权希悦资讯作为其在台湾的代理商。
description.en: In January 2014, Qihoo 360 authorized C-YUE as its agent in Taiwan.

relationships.target: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 自2010年起，百度与奇虎360之间发生了多起法律诉讼，涉及不正当竞争、侵犯商标权以及违反Robots协议等问题，双方互有胜负。
description.en: Starting from 2010, Baidu and Qihoo 360 were involved in multiple lawsuits concerning unfair competition, trademark infringement, and violation of the Robots Exclusion Standard, with rulings in favor of both sides at different times.

relationships.target: 周鸿祎

description.zh-cn: 2010年5月，因周鸿祎在微博等平台发表攻击金山公司的言论，金山公司起诉其名誉侵权并胜诉。
description.en: In May 2010, Kingsoft sued Zhou Hongyi for defamation over his attacks on the company on platforms like Weibo and won the case.

relationships.target: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2010年，双方因“360隐私保护器”和“扣扣保镖”软件爆发了著名的“3Q大战”，随后多年间就商业诋毁、不正当竞争及垄断等问题多次对簿公堂。
description.en: In 2010, the two companies engaged in the famous '3Q War' over the '360 Privacy Protector' and 'KouKou Bodyguard' software, leading to years of litigation over issues like commercial defamation, unfair competition, and monopoly.

relationships.target: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2010年2月，瑞星发文称360安全卫士存在后门，奇虎360随后以捏造事实、不正当竞争为由起诉瑞星并胜诉。
description.en: In February 2010, Rising published an article claiming 360 Safeguard had a backdoor. Qihoo 360 subsequently sued Rising for fabricating facts and unfair competition, and won the case.

relationships.target: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 在2011年至2012年间，金山与奇虎360就强行卸载对方软件、商业诋毁等行为多次互相起诉，双方互有胜负。
description.en: Between 2011 and 2012, Kingsoft and Qihoo 360 sued each other multiple times for actions such as forcibly uninstalling each other's software and commercial defamation, with mixed legal outcomes.

relationships.target: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2011年，李铁军因奇虎360官网发表的文章侵犯其权益而提起诉讼，法院最终判决360侵权行为成立。
description.en: In 2011, Li Tiejun filed a lawsuit against Qihoo 360 for infringement caused by articles on its official website, and the court ultimately ruled that 360's infringement was established.

relationships.target: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2011年9月，因傅盛在社交平台发布抨击性言论，奇虎360起诉其诋毁商业信誉并在一审中胜诉。
description.en: In September 2011, Qihoo 360 sued Fu Sheng for defamation of business reputation due to his critical comments on social media platforms and won the first-instance trial.

relationships.target: 三六零安全科技股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 在2014年至2015年间，搜狗与奇虎360因强制提示用户卸载对方软件、商业诋毁等不正当竞争行为相互起诉，双方互有胜负。
description.en: Between 2014 and 2015, Sogou and Qihoo 360 sued each other for unfair competition practices, such as forcibly prompting users to uninstall the other's software and commercial defamation, with mixed legal outcomes.
